extName.message: Focus Mode Pro - Block Distractions | Zovo
extName.description: Extension name shown in Chrome Web Store and chrome://extensions (max 45 chars)

extShortName.description: Short name for the extension used in limited-space contexts

extDescription.message: Block distracting websites and boost productivity with focus timers. Built-in Pomodoro timer. Whitelist your work sites.
extDescription.description: Extension description shown in Chrome Web Store (max 132 chars)

extActionTitle.description: Tooltip text when hovering over the extension toolbar icon

extCommandToggleFocus.description: Description of the keyboard shortcut command in chrome://extensions/shortcuts

ttlPopup.description: HTML title for the popup page

ttlSettings.description: HTML title for the options/settings page

ttlBlocked.description: HTML title for the blocked site page

ttlWelcome.description: HTML title for the welcome/onboarding page

ttlHelp.description: HTML title for the tips and tricks help page

ttlUpgrade.message: Focus Mode Pro - Upgrade to Pro
ttlUpgrade.description: HTML title for the upgrade page

ttlDashboard.description: HTML title for the dashboard page

appName.description: Short app name used in the popup header

appNameFull.description: Full app name used in options, help, upgrade, dashboard, and blocked page headers

msgLoading.description: Generic loading indicator text displayed in the popup and options page

msgError.description: Generic error heading shown in the popup when something fails

errFailedToConnect.description: Error message shown in popup when background script communication fails

errConnectionFailed.description: Error message shown in popup when background script communication fails (component key)

errFailedToLoadSettings.description: Error message shown in options page when settings cannot be loaded

errFailedLoadSettings.description: Error message shown in options page when settings cannot be loaded (component key)

lblFocusMode.description: Header title in the popup and label for the mode selector section

lblModeFocus.description: Section heading label for the mode selector in the popup

stsActive.description: Badge text shown in popup header when a focus session is running

lblActive.description: Badge text shown in popup header and session status indicating active state

lblActiveLC.description: Lowercase active text used in Pomodoro count indicator (e.g., 3 done, 1 active)

lblPro.description: Badge label for Pro tier users shown in popup header and footer

lblFree.description: Badge label for free tier users shown on the dashboard header

btnSettings.description: Button label to open the extension settings page

btnStatistics.description: Button label to open the statistics tab in settings

msgUnlockAllFeatures.description: Short promotional text shown in the popup upgrade banner for free users

btnUpgradeToPro.description: Call-to-action button text prompting free users to upgrade to Pro

btnUpgradePro.description: Call-to-action button text prompting free users to upgrade to Pro (component key)

btnStartSession.description: Start button text with the selected mode name in the mode selector

ttlPasswordRequired.description: Title of the password verification modal in popup and blocked page

msgEnterPasswordToPause.message: Enter your password to pause the focus session.

errEnterPassword.description: Validation error when the password field is left empty (component key)

errIncorrectPassword.description: Error message when the entered password does not match
